title: Alfred Hitchcock X 54
description:
Update: The last 10 seconds of The Paradine Case are missing. Here is the complete film:  <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4302137/The_Paradine_Case_(1947)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4302137/The_Paradine_Case_(1947)</a>

It would be much appreciated if you make a comment in the case you find that pieces are missing, other kind of errors or if you think there exists a better rip of a film, to help improve this collection for the future. Thanks!
 
                                ----------

54 works from the universally acclaimed Master of Suspense come together for the first time in one collection. These captivating landmark films boast five decades of Hollywood legends, including Peter Lorre, James Stewart, Cary Grant, Kim Novak, Grace Kelly, Ingrid Bergman, Henry Fonda, Sean Connery, Paul Newman, James Mason, Laurence Olivier, Charles Laughton, Anthony Perkins, Montgomery Clift, Eva-Marie Saint, Marlene Dietrich, Gregory Peck and Doris Day. 
Alfred Hitchcock X 54 is the must-own, definitive anthology of gripping works by a true genius.

Downhill (1927)
